remarks: Direction of a directed set.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)
statement:
isdrs.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
isdrs.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
drsdir $p |- ( ( K e. Dirset /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> E. z e. B ( X .<_ z /\ Y .<_ z ) ) $.
$d .<_ z $.
$d B z $.
$d K z $.
$d X z $.
$d Y z $.
